section.p: Ankh uses status icons to show what changes have occurred on a working copy. Ankh identifies if a file is under revision control and shows the appropriate status icon in front it in the Visual Studio .NET solution explorer. All files under revision control are shown with the ( ) icon.

Supported status icons:
( ) - Added item
( ) - Conflicted item
( ) - Deleted item.
( ) - Locked item.
( ) - Modified item.
( ) - Item under revision control, and unchanged.
( ) - Item NOT under revision control.
NOTE: Ankh updates the status icons AFTER files have been saved.
